page.title: 01Gen. description of the area
page.content: This block is situated S.E.of Kidderminster.It includes an exclusive housing area,part of{Kidderminster {Golf Course,}and a nearly completed housing development,the{Spennells Estate,which includes both council and private housing. Radiating outward there is lush open{farmland}with interspersed mixed{woodland}and {two natural pools.}Kidderminster lies in the middle of a shallow basin. The land is largely sandy and slopes gently down to Kidderminster from E. to W{.The farming is mixed;}arable, animal husbandry, horticulture and market gardening. There are{six schools}in the area three First Schools,one Middle,one Special and one Private.There are several buildings of historic interest Harvington Hall is a 15 Century moated hall parts of which are medieval.
